hadith.text: Warrad reported that al-Mughira wrote to Mu'awiya:Peace be upon you, and then coming to the poirt (I should say) that I heard Allah's Messenger (ï·º) as saying: Verily Allah has Prohibited three things and has forbidden three things. He has declared absolutely haram the disobedience of father, burying of daughters alive, and withholding that which you have power to return, and has forbidden three things: irrelevant talk, persistent questioning, and wasting of wealth
